evidence.quote: Before I can provide on-label guidance, I need to know the patient's ER/PR and HER2 status, any prior lines of therapy including CDK4/6 inhibitors, their performance status, and whether there's visceral disease or specific therapy goals.

notes: The response appropriately requests necessary stratifiers to ensure on-label guidance, maintaining compliance and clinical relevance. It is clear, concise, and avoids any off-label suggestions.
